lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: such a small amount can make such a large difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I live a comfortable life, and realize that this is not my right, but a combination of good fortune and fate. It's my responsibility to help make someone's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with 5 to 12 year old children in school. I help kids learn to read, write, and do math. I really love my job, because I believe strongly that education will make the world a better place!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women start businesses, become more educated about finance, increase their self esteem, and be role models for their children and others in their life.
lender.occupational_info: Exploring new opportunities to help women entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much. I want to give back in a concrete way.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I help run a youth organisation that provides opportunities for Canadian youth to travel across Canada and do community development work.

lender.name: Anthony & Kylie
lender.loan_because: we can and so we should...we are passionate about humanitarian services and hope to increase the amount we can loan to benefit communities.
lender.occupational_info: Photography and working with young people in schools to ensure they stay in school.

lender.name: Genevieve Warner
lender.loan_because: I can give what I can and it keeps going.
lender.occupational_info: I help people have great relationships with their animals.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I am committed to helping those not as fortunate as myself. I like helping women around the world to improve their lives and the lives of their kids.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying pre-nursing courses at my local college and have applied to nursing schools in the area for the fall of 2009.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed by the Lord, so I want to be able to share these blessings

lender.name: Dell
lender.loan_because: We all need help and we all need hope
lender.occupational_info: Pastor of a Lutheran church

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Taking the sustainable development debate beyond discussing the environment.

lender.name: Karina
lender.occupational_info: Economic justice advocate

lender.name: Magro Kids
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage my grand children in giving. I match contributions they make out of their earnings dollar for dollar. The concept of micro-lending is a powerful one. Letting the kids pick the project is a great way to introduce them to the concept.
lender.occupational_info: Professional accountant and business owner.

lender.name: hailey
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Sherry Cowden
lender.occupational_info: I am 67. Before I retired, I was a psychotherapist. I listened to people's problems and helped them come up with solutions.

lender.name: Jeff & family
lender.loan_because: we can help.
lender.occupational_info: We are two men married, raising two children. I care for our children, and my partner is a lawyer.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: If I was an impoverished woman, with children, unable to get that something which was necessary to keep my family safe, healthy, and fed, I would be very grateful to have a loan. Knowing that, it is my duty to lend.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Kiva empowers people through loans to support engagement in meaningful occupation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor (occupational therapy) and work at a hospital

lender.name: Varun
lender.loan_because: I can, its easy & I am helping someone.... its a start!
lender.occupational_info: Oil & Gas Industry

lender.name: George and Susanne
lender.loan_because: It improves the life of a person, a family and possibly a community.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others, to be a blessing as I have been blessed, and to show the Love of Christ.

lender.name: Louis & Patt
lender.loan_because: All have been good to us, it is important that we do good to all.
lender.occupational_info: Patt is an IT Director, and Fellow, in Healthcare. Louis is a retired IBM Project Manager. We enjoy nature and meeting people while riding our Harley-Davidson motorcycles.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want people in far-flung parts of the world to know that the U.S. is not just about Coke and Disney
lender.occupational_info: Smartphone developer

lender.name: Shaj
lender.loan_because: humanit oblige
lender.occupational_info: writer

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: interest-free loans make it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the production of advertising; brochures, magazine/newspaper ads, radio/tv commercials for clients.

lender.name: Marta
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I am very lucky to be able to stay home and take care of my children. I want my children to share the joy of giving with me.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Helping people less fortunate than me to make a success of themselves in their own way.....doesn't get much better than that!
lender.occupational_info: I direct television shows and write and produce comedy CDs.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business and I would like to help those that haven't been as lucky as me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneurship student trying to start a web 2.0 company.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: There are times everyone needs a hand, no matter how small.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: i try to be involved in activities that help people and i think this is more successful and useful than simple charity
lender.occupational_info: I work with poor, disabled, and underprivileged people with various mental health problems by helping them find and keep jobs.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to think that I can positively impact someone's life for $25
lender.occupational_info:
I am a former newspaper guy, now a web producer for a b2b media company. I also blog about fishing at RoundValleyFishing.com
To get a better idea of how Kiva works check out this video. http://vimeo.com/2769845

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: Why not

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: My curiosity
lender.occupational_info: Part-time computer science student, also developing software tools for proteomics

lender.name: Skyler
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help those that are less fortunate then me. I believe in a hand up not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to stop using drugs and alcohol.

lender.name: Hollie
lender.loan_because: I like to help
lender.occupational_info: i collect eggs everyday and care for chickens and turkeys

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: we are friends who have not met yet. and because i still long to do something for africa... for Mozambique in particular (where i onced lived). i am lending elsewhere, because i am giving beyond my heart and what I am familiar with...

lender.name: christophe
lender.loan_because: I found that this is a great idea to do something for someone who needs... I really feel like helping people and empower them by lending them a few money. And a few money for a lot of us is a great deal in a lot of places in the world.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: It's always good to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Better life beginns with more work.
lender.occupational_info: own a transport company, doing truck transport across Europe.

lender.name: Nils-Arne
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to share with others and I think this is an excellent program.
lender.occupational_info: I sell crop insurance which guarantees the farmer who purchases it that he will receive a certain amount of compensation if he has a crop failure.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: other people need it, and I have enough right now.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. It's very fun, sometimes.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's a great thing to do.

lender.name: Doug
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to prevent computer fraud and other security breaches.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Trade currency.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My Sister Intoduced me to Kiva with a Gift Certificate In my 29 years as a Self Employed Woodworker I know the feeling of being helped when in need And would like to pass that on
lender.occupational_info: Woodworking A sh to Z ebrawood

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization who assists low-income women who are unable to afford reproductive healthcare. I stand up for women's rights and hope one day to see all individuals treated with justice and equality.

lender.name: carole
lender.loan_because: i have seen the need first hand in africa and also believe that sometimes all you need is so little and we can all do that!!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business grow and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I build computers systems to help people connect to the Internet.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: To help people who are not as fortunate as me and to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Student- Middle School.

lender.name: violetta
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to exploit their full potential and to achieve their well-deserved pride for what they have accomplished

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: People who are willing to work hard to make a better life for themselves and their family should not have to find it so difficult to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I study how intense light behaves when it interacts with materials including living cells and biological tissues. I'm helping to develop laser-based medical imaging and microscopy techniques.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Because we all need to take better care of each other: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world."

lender.name: Jochen
lender.loan_because: I can't really explain, I've got so many reasons to. I'm just very happy to have this possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 31 years old and have a son of 8 years. I'm assistant manager at an Insurance broker and I'm developing computer software (in financal business) as well. Got lots of hobbies and no time for them, too :)

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves to make dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to work medical equipment.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: Can be exciting at times and boring at times. I earn a decent wage and that is very important.

lender.name: Angelo& Family
lender.loan_because: To provide micro-loans to people who can't otherwise obtain funding for business ventures

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: (1) I believe we have the ethical responsibility to alleviate poverty (2) I believe microfinance and capitalism are geat ways to promote a more prosperous world.

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: I believe in woman's ressources.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the local government to build up collective equipments (exemples : library, sport center).

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
I live comfortably enough thanks to others giving me a chance. Now it's my turn to help.
In the face of discriminiation, I also want to demonstrate that both atheists and gay people remain generous, productive members of society.
lender.occupational_info: I help university students succeed.

lender.name: BXRWXR
lender.loan_because: People that have less should have the opportunity.

lender.name: Jin
lender.loan_because: I have had a lot of help from others over the course of my life and this is one of the ways that I can give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist who studies the relationship between landscape and culture. I interview people about their work as farmers, herders, craftsmen/women, fishing, alcohol production, and so on. I also observe them as they harvest and use wild plants. I work in villages in Matutuine District, Mozambique - so I know how much just a little input of money can go a long way.

lender.name: Reijo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, who are starting a new business or want to develope their curret business. Good luck to all entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: Since 1985 I have been work as a bank manager in Finland.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: Opportunities to thrive should be like the sun: born every day, and always shining upon us.
lender.occupational_info: Discovering needs, developing concepts, seducing consumers

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to give back....

lender.name: Saheli
lender.loan_because: I hope that more equitable access to capital will allow more of my fellow human beings to pursue prosperous and satisfying work, enabling better health, civic engagement, and peace throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach physics and chemistry to students grades 10-12. Sometimes I also write articles.

lender.name: Keya
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: My work only benefits myself, which is why I want to help someone else.

lender.name: patrickdh
lender.loan_because: Love to be a catalyst to other people's success
lender.occupational_info: We advise companies and enterprise organizations on how to leverage their unique assets to enhance customer relationships

lender.name: Jacobs Homola Beth Fams
lender.loan_because: We decided that we would loan this year instead of buy each other "meaningless" Christmas presents. We will just keep putting the money back in to new loans. Its a great alternative.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to help others.

lender.name: Dana-Lynn
lender.loan_because: Heavenly Father has blessed me so much and it's time for me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in my home caring for children while their parents work.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life. I have been given a great deal and I think that it is only fair that I can share some of what I have. I believe in community and I think that it everyone has a responsibility to each other. I would want someone to do it for me so I am privileged to do it for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I study health and work on making health in my community better by learning about people's health needs.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to invest in others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people in a public school. Our focus is the importance of stories: the ones we live and the ones we read.

lender.name: R.,S.,R.,S. R-G
lender.loan_because: He who is not busy being born is busy dying. Bob.Dylan

lender.name: Yohemas Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and we all need good karma. ;-) We are donating in behalf of my parents Greg and Dorene Yohemas.
lender.occupational_info: Tom works for Statistics Canada, Jannicke is raising Marius and Trystan is in junior high school.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Thinking

lender.name: Cort
lender.loan_because:
1) I can.
2) I want to help others succeed.
3) I am interested in micro-finance and like the direct connection that I get through Kiva.

lender.name: Lilia
lender.occupation: Real estate investor and IT consultant

lender.name: zachary
lender.loan_because: it feels good
lender.occupational_info: taking care of mind

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs grow their businesses and help prove microfinance works
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and teach entrepreneurship

lender.name: Marilyn & Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an insurance adjuster, my husband repairs houses.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: this is exciting.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of families across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing my masters degree in business administration.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to help me as well...
lender.occupational_info: HELPING CUSTOMERS

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in Wellington New Zealand

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: It is what I can do. A little to me it a lot to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I bring contractors and customers together to do great projects.

lender.name: Crewton
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people that math isn't hard.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it's a way to make a real difference in the life of someone who really needs the help. It's a way of "changing the world--or some definite part of it--for the better" (in the words of the St. Francis Prayer).
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school (ages 14-18) in inner-city Boston where I run the school's network, help teachers learn and use new technology, and aid students in their research. At the Universalist Unitarian Church of Haverhill, I work on social justice and environmental issues.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I am a national representative for the Student Christian Movement of Canada, a student movement which seeks justice in the world. My faith drives me to action, and I seek to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: Community health nurse for HIV and Sexually Transmitted Diseases

lender.name: Tina & Tony
lender.loan_because: We want to give a helping hand - and lift up

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who design new color printers (for personal computers). My job is to make sure the new printer works well and works for a long time (reliable & high quality).

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to be self sufficient, and i hope to help make that a reality for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in healthcare .

lender.name: Samanvitha
lender.loan_because: as I help another, I help myself.

lender.name: Jeffrey Gillespie
lender.loan_because: Giving is mandatory if you live in a rich country, regardless of faith or politics.
lender.occupational_info: I sell fine art and sculpture.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I can. I am lucky enough to have some spare change at the end of the week, so therefore I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach 9 and10 year olds, which is the fourth grade here. I am responsible for teaching all subjects. Most of my students are English learners, so they also have to learn the language along with all the curriculum. I love my job and could not think of anything else I'd rather do.

lender.name: Richard & Renee
lender.loan_because: My wife is from Thailand and we own a small home in the Suphanburi Province. We have visited Cambodia many times through work with our charity. On every visit we've been received warmly by the people of Cambodia, so we try to help as much as we can.
lender.occupational_info: We have been blessed in life and strongly believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Quinn
lender.occupational_info: I record video of events and make DVD's to sell to the performers. We also do advanced video editing, promotional videos, weddings and everything in-between.

lender.name: tyehimba
lender.loan_because: these loans are a hell of a lot more deserved than the $700 billion loans given to the US banking industry!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and write poems.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is everything.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Makalika
lender.loan_because: you only have limited opportunities to do something that helps someone dramatically AND is fun, easy, and relatively cheap.

lender.name: Coz
lender.loan_because: a small drop in a big ocean is better than no drop at all.

lender.name: Carol 97756
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping women across the world help themselves. A loan repaid is self-perpetuating
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer as a long-term care ombudsman and with food banks and adult education classes to promote nutrition, food preservation and safety.

lender.name: Fisher Girl
lender.loan_because: My mommy and daddy are teaching me that helping others is really important.

lender.name: Dino & Matt
lender.loan_because: We love to travel the world and have been treated very kindly by people we meet in our travels.
lender.occupational_info: Dino is a writer. Matt helps design cities.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of peoples children while they work.

lender.name: katie
lender.occupational_info: I also work as a volunteer with La Leche League Canada helping other mothers who are looking for breastfeeding information and support.

lender.name: Adolfo
lender.loan_because: I am not a wealthy person, but I think money isn't in appropriated way distributed across the world, So, I just want to help somebody to change his/her life with a small grain of sand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Insurance Agent living in this wonderful country during the last 10 years

lender.name: Ezra
lender.loan_because: I would rather empower individuals to help themselves than just give money to some big charity where there is no insight into what they do with it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them communicate with people online

lender.name: One Million Dollar Team
lender.loan_because:
I want to change the world and make a positive difference in the lives of others. I also want to teach my students that nothing is impossible. I want to show them that even they can make a huge difference in making the world a better place. I even set the high expectation that our Kiva Team can even achieve loaning $1,000,000 with the help of others. I teach the kids 2 mottos:
Live simply that others may simply live. - Ghandi
We must be the change we wish to see in the world. - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: I have the greatest job in the world. I have the opportunity to help kids achieve success and my goal is that they learn, have fun, and see the importance of being a good person. There is nothing better than helping others and teaching them the importance of helping others.

lender.name: Joni, Aaron, Gabe &Lulu
lender.loan_because: We have lived in developing countries, and adopted our daughter from Vietnam - we know the impact a small amount of money can make on individual lives.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are attorneys. I help workers, and he prosecutes criminals.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be able to take care of themselves and their loved ones. I have met so many wonderful, hard working people and I think we should all help each other to be able to better care for our families.

lender.name: A New Team Adventure
lender.loan_because: At our company, A New Team Advenure, we strive to give back to others in every way possible. this is one of those ways.
lender.occupational_info: We help corporations do great things in the community by organizing projects where they can help those who need help.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get started in a new business
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their business

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women start businesses and be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Discovering new opportunities.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: It helps people in their projects

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do....
lender.occupational_info: I take care of several buildings...I do the cleaning, painting, carpentry and maintainance its fun and keeps me moving a lot.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of directly helping people and believe in the power of individual grassroots power to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent engineering graduate and hope to use this through engineers without borders eventually.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an actor of theater and television and I'm currently working on my first novel (which is my main activity these days).

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I can help to make people's lives happier and to end vicious cycles of poverty.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference.....
lender.occupational_info: i'm retired now...used to do factory work......

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Running a small risk to help people develop their businesses seems to be good in every way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children age 7-16 when their regular teachers are sick or have other duties to attend to. That means I get around in all classes, substituting for all kinds of teachers in all kinds of classes.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to run their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers work properly.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I have so much.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics in a public high school.

lender.name: Dana & Daniel
lender.loan_because: it gives people at shot at a dream...at a better life.

lender.name: Ree
lender.loan_because: I hope the small bit I can do makes a difference for these wonderful people and makes their lives easier. I enjoy the process of reading about the them, I'm interested in their stories, in their hopes and dreams. To Kiva is somewhat addictive, I keep coming back and loaning again, especially when I need a boost.

lender.name: Zal
lender.loan_because: As Albert Schweitzer says, "Wherever a man [or woman] turns, he can find someone who needs him."

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It is very fulfilling to be able to fund entrepreneurs around the world. I find Kiva an amazing, brilliant and game changing service.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I study law at a university.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I am the main cook in a busy but small restaurant.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who need a hand to get started, or to maintain their current business. I have a little extra I can spare, so I'm happy to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I help the webmaster of an international conservation organization by editing the text on the website to make sure the pages are easily understood by the reader, and also to make sure there are no errors in the text. I work as a volunteer.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about gardening and raising animals.I am blessed to have what I need and want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Collect plasma (a blood product) from donors to make life saving medication

lender.name: Duckie
lender.loan_because: it's a direct way of helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I made books by hand, both the covers and the pages.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I recently started my own business. The process has been so educational and invigorating. It has prompted me to lift other woman up so that they are able to experience the same sense of joy and pride that I have had the pleasure of experiencing.
lender.occupational_info: I actually have three jobs. I am a mother to two small children, I am an interventional Technologist ( I assist Doctor's in taking specialized x-rays of the organs and blood vessels of the body, and I am a small business owner in which I care for other peoples pets when they are traveling.

lender.name: Kiyome
lender.loan_because: why wouldn't I

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me and I also believe that by doing something good today something even better will happen tomorrow.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: there are people that need more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising space on the internet.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because:
although I am a student and I struggle to pay for things in my life, I feel extremely fortunate compared to the struggles that many people face in the world. I am passionate about helping women across the world become more confident and independent, both personally and financially. I wish you the best of luck!
Aunque yo sea estudiante y en este momento yo tampoco puedo pagar por todo lo que necesito, siento extremamente afortunada comparado con mucha gente en el mundo. Me apasiona ayudar a las mujeres del mundo tener mas confianza y independencia, economicamente y personalmente. Suerte!
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, studying Global Studies and Environmental Studies. I hope to work for an international non-profit environmental organization in the near future.

lender.name: Kevin M. Doyle
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of biodiversity conservation and land rights.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: I like to see how the money will grow and help people.
lender.occupational_info: nerdy stuff

lender.name: Luc
lender.loan_because: I believe in human being power, like ants we can build a better world, even with very small income, everyone can do something.
lender.occupational_info: Is it important?

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: We are all part of one another. Sharing makes me feel connected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and grandmother with a loving partner who supports me so I don't need to work for money.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have had amazing opportunities in my life; opportunities that wouldn't have been there without the funding I recieved from a local children's charity and my college.
lender.occupational_info: I'm researching mathematicsat the University of Bristol. I work on Random Matrix theory, which means I am applying techniques from various areas of mathematics to understand primes and the zeros of L-functions.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: i believe in microloans
lender.occupational_info: in healthcare

lender.name: Arthur
lender.occupational_info: Sitting behind the computer a lot..

lender.name: Duan & Colin
lender.loan_because: In our few short years together, we have had to start our lives over several times already. By helping others to begin again, we hope to help people find stability and self-sufficiency. We also hope that we can encourage others to look outside themselves and find ways to pay it forward.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I love to see people do well in business, and we all need a little help at times.
lender.occupational_info: We own a roofing and guttering business, working on both residential and commercial properties.

lender.name: nguyen
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who try to help themselves

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in someone's ability to support himself/herself.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software that helps newspapers.

lender.name: Dancingdots
lender.loan_because: The amount of money it takes to make life a bit easier is so little, I will add more when I am able to. Hopefully, I can convince more of my friends and co-workers to joint me at this.
lender.occupational_info: I make nice and comfortable clothing for other people.

lender.name: Rui Martins
lender.occupation: Membro da Comisso Executiva do MIL
lender.loan_because: Porque acredito que possvel desenvolver os povos dos pases lusfonos atravs de micro-crdito
lender.occupational_info: Tecnologias de Informao

lender.name: chales
lender.occupation: An accountant in nigeria loaning agency

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I love hearing the personal stories. I have been lucky in life, and I want to help others' fortunes.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to help themselves and fight for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make buildings healthier, more energy efficient and less harmful to the environment.

lender.name: William
lender.occupation: Chief of Staff, US Congressman Oberstar

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a university campus (UCSB) operating several dining facilities.

lender.name: Natanya
lender.loan_because: There is no other way to bring someone out of poverty. This is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, a wife, a cook, a house cleaner, a band aid applier, a homework helper, a taxi driver, a grocery shopper, a list maker, a dish washer, a clothes washer, etc...

lender.name: Vivek
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone who wants to change their life for the better should be given the opportunity to succeed.
